price: 27. Jinkana, Waxaan ka abuurnay awal hore dab ololaya (malaa’igtana nuur ifaya).
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
